title: Neuromuscular junction degeneration in a human stem cell derived assembloid model of Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis
abstract: The neuromuscular junction (NMJ) is the synaptic connection between motor neuron (MN) endplate and skeletal muscle, transmitting neuronal signalling into muscle contraction. Several neuromuscular diseases, as well as healthy aging, are affected …
